sentences.en: ...the minister's young and rather vapid wife.
But theproblem is that Ms Merkel has been delivering similarly vapid speeches aroundthe whole country.
sentences.cn: 但是问题在于Merkel已经在全国范围内宣讲了她那单调乏味的演说.

sentences.en: Ethan loves kung - fu movies, but Joe thinks they are just vapid entertainment.
sentences.cn: 伊桑喜欢功夫电影, 但乔却认为那是无趣的娱乐.

sentences.en: He did the same thing year by year and found life vapid.
sentences.cn: 他每年做着同样的事,觉得生活索然无味.

sentences.en: He's just another slice off the loaf of shallow vapid pain - in - the - ass 09 erdom.
sentences.cn: 他只是09社区那帮肤浅而讨人厌的人的后辈而已.

sentences.en: His conversation was vapid in the extreme.
In vapid Listlessness I leant my head against the window, and continued spelling over Catherine Earnshaw?
sentences.cn: 我无精打采地把头靠在窗子上, 接连地拼写着凯瑟琳?

sentences.en: Is is increasingly part of a vapid and commercialised mass - media culture.
sentences.cn: 它是商业化的乏味的大众传媒中快速发展的一部分.

sentences.en: Pre - millennialism – vapid understanding of the eternal state – God will get licks in.
sentences.cn: 前千禧年派对永恒的状况如何看待?上帝要来报复?

sentences.en: She made a vapid comment about the weather.
sentences.cn: 她对天气作了一番平淡无奇的评论。

sentences.en: Sun Xiu was taught a lesson, feeling vapid. He left with a touch of his nose.
sentences.cn: 孙休被扁子教训了一顿,自觉无趣, 摸摸鼻子,走了.

sentences.en: The theory is vapid, while the life is colorful.
sentences.cn: 理论是灰色的, 唯生活之树常青.
汤姆不喜欢无味的食物.

sentences.en: Too much hard working will make life vapid and kill the vitality and sunshine of life.
sentences.cn: 多虚伪呀,功用太重又索然无味扼杀了生命的生机与灿烂.

sentences.en: With every advantage of lungs and elocution, the effect is singularly vapid.
sentences.cn: 然而,扯着嗓子、抑扬顿挫地朗诵, 其结果却是令听者兴味索然.

sentences.en: With every advantage of lungs and elocution, the effect is vapid.
sentences.cn: 然而,扯着嗓子 、 扬顿挫地朗诵,其结果却是令听者兴味索然.

words.tran_cn: 无趣味的；无生气的；索然乏味的

trans.tran_cn: 乏味的，无滋味的，无趣味的，无生气的
